reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Chen's lectures are engaging and her lab sessions are incredibly informative. Best professor I've had!

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Brown brings history to life with his storytelling. Sometimes goes off-topic, but always interesting.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson knows her stuff, but can be a bit dry in lectures. Office hours are helpful.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Prof. Lee's practical approach to teaching programming is excellent. Very patient with beginners.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Green's research experience adds depth to her lectures. Assignments can be challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson moves too fast in lectures. Difficult to follow without extensive prior knowledge.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez makes complex concepts easy to understand. Her enthusiasm is contagious!

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Prof. Taylor's knowledge is vast, but he can be intimidating in class discussions.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. White's classes are thought-provoking. Group projects are particularly enlightening.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Garcia's real-world examples are helpful, but his exams are notoriously difficult.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Lee's passion for art is evident in every lecture. Field trips to museums were a highlight.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. Kim encourages critical thinking and lively debates. Very knowledgeable about current events.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson's hands-on approach to learning is fantastic. Lab work is engaging and relevant.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Davis often seems unprepared for lectures. Discussions can be circular and unproductive.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Dr. Rodriguez explains complex brain functions clearly. Her research insights are fascinating.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Prof. Miller's corporate experience is valuable, but his teaching style can be inconsistent.

reviews.subject: Genetics
reviews.review: Dr. Patel is an exceptional educator. Her ability to simplify complex genetic concepts is remarkable.

reviews.subject: Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review: Prof. Chen's practical labs complement theoretical lectures well. Assignments are challenging but fair.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Carter's lectures are informative but can be monotonous. Field work opportunities are excellent.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Prof. Anderson's enthusiasm for music is infectious. His classes are a perfect blend of theory and practice.
